ideas from there? Perhaps a high level druid could, instead of summoning 
forest creatures, polymorph into them himself. Also, another spell worthy of 
a druid would be chain lightning. Everyone knows druids are in close contact 
with nature, and how does nature demonstarte her destructivness more than 
lightning? Unless someone wants to program a tornado.
